title: 84/149/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 March 1984 approving a programme for the processing and marketing of durum wheat in the Region of Sicily, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 March 1984
approving a programme for the processing and marketing of durum wheat in the Region of Sicily, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(84/149/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The programme for the processing and marketing of durum wheat in the Region of Sicily, pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77, submitted by the Italian Government on 8 July 1983 is hereby approved, except for the part concerning seed production.
2. Approval of the programme relates only to projects submitted before 30 April 1984.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 March 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 332, 27. 11. 1982, p. 1.
